description:
GoGuardian is a web filtering and classroom management software for schools. It is designed to help educators monitor and manage student Chromebook and laptop usage.

• Web Filtering - GoGuardian can block inappropriate or distracting websites based on categories or custom filters set by the school. It also notifies educators when students visit blocked sites.

• Screen Monitoring - GoGuardian lets educators view screenshots of what their students are looking at on their devices in real-time. Admins can also see full session replays.

• Activity monitoring - GoGuardian tracks student Chromebook and laptop usage, showing time spent on each website and application. It also notifies educators of risky behaviors.

• Student alerts - GoGuardian alerts educators when students search for certain keywords or show at-risk behaviors like cyberbullying. Educators can then intervene.

• Device management - GoGuardian allows admins to manage student devices, locking devices down and enforcing school-appropriate settings.

The pros of GoGuardian are that it provides effective and comprehensive monitoring and management of student devices. It can help promote safe and productive digital learning environments.

The cons are that some view the monitoring features as an invasion of student privacy. It also requires integration with Google admin accounts and Chromebooks.
name: goguardian
